DOC.brief_summary: This four-year study , fund Center Disease Control Prevention , related antimicrobial resistance rural community . The project consist four component : A ) surveillance antimicrobial resistance , B ) promotion appropriate antimicrobial drug prescribing , C ) preliminary assessment environmental impact antimicrobial , D ) development new antimicrobial product . Six rural community Utah , six rural community Idaho participate study . Component D perform investigator Harvard University , direction Co-Investigator Roger Inouye .
DOC.brief_title: Inter-Mountain Project Antimicrobial Resistance Therapy ( IMPART )
DOC.criteria: Suspected upper respiratory infection patient 12 rural community Utah Idaho
